overview: When Chad, a straight-laced single-dad, and Xander, a depraved porn star, switch bodies as the result of a supernatural, once-in-a-lifetime event, i they both discover what it's like to live, and to love, as someone else. But after returning back to their own bodies, and losing their new girlfriends as a result, Chad and Xander realize that, in order to be the people they always wanted to be, they'll have to learn to be each other instead.
title: The Switch
